trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Buxton
There were no other sightings in Buxton on or around January 6th 2011
Summary: A bright triangle with therr smaler lights on the points and it would change shape to a circle and dim
divs: sighting detailsi had just arrived at southern maine beagle club at a few miniuts before 5 am on january 6thto run my two hounds i went in to the running grounds and let the dogs loose and walked out to the out building to start a fire in the wood stove .after i got a fire going i went out to check on the dogs .it was a cristal clear morning and the stars were out as i was looking to the south i saw a shooting star and folowed it across the sky when i saw a real bright light and said to my self what planet is that but as i was looking at it i saw it was to big and too close to be a star or planet as i watched it it began to move and i mean in a rapid right than to the left and up and down i am a privet pilot and never saw any thing move that fast or reverse direction that fast i judge it to have been moving about 30 to 50 miles in secs i was so taking by what i was seeing that i could not take my eyes off of it some time had passed maby 1\2 hour when to the south a plane came in to veiw the object then stoped moving turned in to a circle from a triangle and then dimed the plane passed under it by i would say 5 to 6 thousand feet when the plane was gon it changed back to a triangle and began to move again the object was at 170 dreges south i say that because i had a gps tracking coller on the dog and i looked at the compas to document it for my self then i wanted some one elst to know what i was seeing so i called a co woker *(name deleted--cms\sg) in south portland but he didnot awnser it was too early so i left him a message then i called my wife and told her what i was watching it remaind in the same quadrent moveing up down back and forth again a plane came it vew once again it changed shape and dimmed until the plane was gone then i remberd my cell phone had a camera so i took three photos of it the sun was rising and stars were faiding but it still remaind bright abuot 6:05 it began to asend strait up until it was gone
